Synopsis: Displays your generated external help as Get-Help output.
Description: The Get-HelpPreview cmdlet displays your generated external help as Get-Help output. Specify one or more files in Microsoft Assistance Markup Language (MAML) format.

Examples.Title: Example 1: Preview the PlatyPS help
Examples.Code:
PS C:\> $Help = Get-HelpPreview -Path ".\out\platyPS\en-US\PlatyPS-help.xml"

PS C:\> $Help.Name

Get-HelpPreview
Get-MarkdownMetadata
New-ExternalHelp
New-ExternalHelpCab
New-MarkdownHelp
Update-MarkdownHelp
Update-MarkdownHelpModule
Update-MarkdownHelpSchema
The first command creates a Help object for the the specified MAML file. The command stores it in the $Help variable.

The second command displays the Name property for each of the objects in $Help.
